nodes.text: The speederboard was a repulsorcraft utilized by clone Advance Recon Force troopers during the Clone Wars. It was known for providing quick, easy transportation, without utilizing the user's hands, which allowed them to use a variety of weapons. This feature was incredibly useful on waterworlds such as Kamino.

In 21 BBY, the Confederacy of Independent Systems launched a full scale invasion of Kamino. As a swarm of aqua droids began to invade the capital of Tipoca City, the Rancor Battalion was deployed to fend of the Separatist invaders. One of the troopers of this unit, an ARF trooper, utilized a speederboard with a DC-15A blaster rifle. His speederboard had maroon and brown markings, with a black and white Galactic Roundel in the centre.

The speederboard was created by Hasbro in 2011 for their Star Wars: The Clone Wars line of toys. Specifically, the ARF Trooper (Kamino) set. It came with both a speederboard, and an ARF trooper within Rancor Battalion, equipped with two DC-15A blaster rifles.
